about_the_game:
The last humans in an unfamiliar expanse


After surviving an outer space anomaly, the crew of a remote human space station find themselves teleported to what seems to be their home galaxy forward in the future. A future in which humanity has gone extinct. The crew comes to learn that the galaxy is now the battleground of several species of alien life, each attempting to wipe out the other. Caught in the middle of it all, the last of humanity fuels up their experimental Mark II crusader starfighter, and searches out a way to harness the alien tech in hopes of returning to their time. It's time to crash this party.

Fight your way through the hordes of three unique alien races in this fast paced starship combat rougelite.
Explore interesting zones that reflect the civilizations that make their home in the area
Navigate through dangerous asteroid fields, aggressive enemy space installations, and deadly black holes
Collect power ups and currency to spend on base and ship upgrades
Roguelite card progression system to make sure no run feels the same
Unlockable content through completion of milestones and achievements
Defeat enemy Dreadnaughts, steal their advanced tech, and return to earth to uncover what led to the extinction of Humanity.

name: Tombstone Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Fast paced, action packed roguelite in space. Pilot your space ship to defeat waves of enemies, but be careful - they are coming for your station.
